metadata.title: CVE-2021-46962 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mmc:uniphier-sd: Fix a resource leak in the remove function A'tmio_mmc_host_free()' call is missing in the remove function, in order tobalance a 'tmio_mmc_host_alloc()' call in the probe. This is done in theerror handling path of the probe, but not in the remove function. Add themissing call.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
